author: rpawson
msg: Overrode the initialiseAmount() method to initialise the Accommodation, Food & Other fields, to overcome currency parsing error

author: rcmatthews
msg: Descriptions for options are changed to an empty string instead of being left as null (for better message concatenation).

author: rcmatthews
msg: RegEx processor now places a much better message into the regex failure exception

author: rcmatthews
msg: If an reflectively called method throws a runtime exception this is now thrown on (rather than a ReflectionException)

author: rcmatthews
msg: Now when the browser back button is used the UI tries to continue, and if it cannot it will put a message to say so. - fixes #414
